price: (26) They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allāh].
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
